alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Tammany, east central Livingston and southern Tangipahoa Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Natalbany, or near Hammond, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Independence, Madisonville, Springfield, Natalbany, Robert and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 35 and 59. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 17 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany
